resources.string: As\'s this one. Even if strangely wrapped.
Strangely wrapped highlight is on the wrong line! Find\'s it, but wrong position.
It's not broken, when more normally wrapped and the problem is on the first line.
It also breaks, if it\'s more normally wrapped.
This isn\'t borked. The highlight is correct.
But, this should not be highlighted, as the problem ain't in that line.
